title: Getting Started with Meilisearch
body: Meilisearch is a powerful, fast, and easy-to-use search engine. It provides instant search results with typo tolerance and faceted search capabilities.

title: Meilisearch Performance
body: Meilisearch delivers sub-50ms search results even with millions of documents. It uses a prefix-based algorithm optimized for user-facing search experiences.

title: Email Search Integration
body: Integrate Meilisearch with Stalwart mail server for fast email search. Configure the external FTS store to index email content, subjects, and attachments.

title: Typo Tolerance Configuration
body: Meilisearch automatically handles typos and misspellings. Configure the number of allowed typos per word length for optimal search accuracy.

title: Faceted Search and Filters
body: Use faceted search to let users filter results by category, date, or custom attributes. Meilisearch supports both string and numeric filters.
